title: Cuisinart Kitchen Tools & Gadgets: Food Scraper, 12' Tongs, and Meat Thermometer Demo

asset.author: CuisinartVideo
asset.hookText:
Learn more: http://www.cuisinart.com/products/kitchen_tools___gadgets.html

The Cuisinart® Food Scraper is perfect to use for dough and chopping, as well as scraping food particles from flat surfaces. The food scraper has a soft-grip handle and stainless steel blade. Food scraper also has easy-to-read measure marks to ease of use. Dishwasher Safe.

Every kitchen needs at least one good set of tongs. This versatile tool can toss a salad, flip a cutlet, and safely pick items right out of boiling water! Cuisinart 12" tongs feature a soft-grip handle, a locking pull tab for easy storage and is made from heavy-gauge stainless steel. Dishwasher Safe.

The Cuisinart® Stainless Steel Meat Thermometer is perfect for roasting meats or poultry, with an easy to read dial that displays desired temperature. Meat thermometer is oven safe to 450 degrees F.
